page.title: 02S. Yorks. Times Extract.
page.content:
FRIDAY JULY 12 -DENABY.
South Yorkshire County Council have unveiled plans for a Â£2 million wildlife and leisure development for the former Denaby Main Colliery site. It is hoped that the project could provide a major tourism and employment boost for one of the most depressed areas of South Yorkshire..... The highlight of the project to be known as Don Valley Park would be a flight forum...and a wildlife park...The development is expected to attract large crowds throughout the year......
